name: Tropical Paradise Green Smoothie
description: The balanced and decidedly tropical flavors of this friendly green smoothie are just the ticket to a relaxed state of mind.
recipeIngredient: 1 cup coconut water or pineapple juice
1/2 cup packed cilantro leaves and tender stems

recipeInstructions.text: Combine coconut water or pineapple juice with spinach, banana, peach, cilantro, and lime in a blender and process until perfectly smooth. Serve immediately.
